titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the additional standard deduction for real property taxes for nonitemizers for 2010.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the additional standard deduction for real property taxes for nonitemizers for 2010.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the additional standard tax deduction for real property taxes for taxpayers who do not itemize their tax deductions.
